item.description: NEW & innovative Drop-In Class centered around FUN! This class would concentrate on tricks, moves and sequences with the ultimate goal of one day having a performance team! ALL breeds, sizes and ages welcome! Helpful, but not completely necessary, to have attended a few Drop-Ins to have worked on attention to handler and basics like sit & down. Dog must have some very basic skills and may not be aggressive. Come one, come all! This is going to be a BLAST! Cost is $20 per dog per Drop-In! Join the start of something great :)............................... What I would really like this to turn into is a solid group of dogs who can perform at events, assisted-living homes, schools and more! You can see snippets of some of the moves on http://www.youtube.com/NEBBCSoldiers. Hope to see you there! Classes will start after the first of the year and be every Saturday at 10:00a at Lucky Dogs Daycare (80 Sumner Street, Milford). Email me direct at justcassie101@gmail.com with any questions.
item.name: Doggie Drill Team!! Drop-In Class, every Saturday at 10:00a!
